sqlMap.insert: insert into DC_GPS_REAL (TMN_CODE, TMN_ALIAS, REPORT_TIME, LOGIT, LAT, SPEED, ANGLE, HEIGHT, GSM_SIGN, GPS_SATL,STATE, LOC_DESC, ZCODE, GPS_TYPE,PRECISION,SERVER_TIME , LOGIT_OFFSET, LAT_OFFSET) values (#tmnKey:VARCHAR#, #tmnAlias:VARCHAR#, #rptTime:DECIMAL#, #lon:DECIMAL#, #lat:DECIMAL#, #speed:VARCHAR#, #dire:VARCHAR#, #altitude:VARCHAR#, #gsmSign:VARCHAR#, #satlSign:VARCHAR#,#state:VARCHAR#, #locDesc:VARCHAR#, #zCode:VARCHAR#, #gpsType:VARCHAR#,#precision:VARCHAR#,#serverTime:DECIMAL# , #lonOff:DECIMAL#,#latOff:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update DC_GPS_REAL set TMN_ALIAS = #tmnAlias:VARCHAR#, REPORT_TIME = #rptTime:DECIMAL#, LOGIT = #lon:DECIMAL#, LAT = #lat:DECIMAL#, SPEED = #speed:VARCHAR#, ANGLE = #dire:VARCHAR#, HEIGHT = #altitude:VARCHAR#, GSM_SIGN = #gsmSign:VARCHAR#, GPS_SATL = #satlSign:VARCHAR#, LOC_DESC = #locDesc:VARCHAR#, ZCODE = #zCode:VARCHAR#, GPS_TYPE = #gpsType:VARCHAR#, PRECISION= #precision:VARCHAR#, SERVER_TIME = #serverTime:DECIMAL#, LOGIT_OFFSET= #lonOff:VARCHAR#, LAT_OFFSET = #latOff:DECIMAL#, STATE = #state:DECIMAL# where TMN_CODE = #tmnKey:VARCHAR#
